parameters.correct: Number of words correctly recalled, out of 40 on final trial of the experiment.

reference:
Friendly, M. and Franklin, P. (1980) 
Interactive presentation in multitrial free recall. 
Memory and Cognition
8 265–270 [Personal communication from M. Friendly].
title: Format Effects on Recall
description:
Description
The Friendly data frame has 30 rows and 2 columns.
The data are from an experiment on subjects' ability to remember words
based on the presentation format.
format: This data frame contains the following columns:
